1653740.name: The Exomachinist
1653740.description:
In this action/strategy game you are sent with an experimantal spaceship to explore a mysterious planet where the secret hideout of the Exomachinist is being suspected.

You are controlling the ship and a team of 4 units fighting the forces of the Exomachinist.

Only a few know about the one called The Exomachinist. Some of those who do and work for him, are involved in secret technologies which could endanger more than just Earth.
... Then there are the ones who are trying to stop him.

FEATURES
  • Custom retro-style game engine with real-time lighting and particle effects.
  • Use your ship as a powerful weapons platform and to shield your team from incoming enemy fire.
  • Build new weapons and upgrades using collected resources.

ATTACK AND PROTECT
Targets can be attacked with your team and your ship. Your team can hide behind the ship for some protection. However, while strong, it won't last forever. Destroying enemies and special objects will leave resources behind which can be used to build new weapons and upgrades.


EXPLORING A MAP
During a mission your ship stays behind the map background and can move anywhere, while your team moves around the given paths. This allows your ship to access areas your team can't.
